name: The METAJACKET: RTFKT X Retrocoin
description: The META JACKET is RTFKT's first jacket. The METAJACKET embodies RTFKT's vision in a new digital skins economy and creative new age in digital Fashion, reskinned by next gen artist Retrocoin, a creative collective of 3 working on creating a unique and connective style to every piece, recollecting the past, living the present, representing the future.
